Our Story

Elst means sanctuary.

Our goal is to create fine beers that speak to people with an obsession with beer.

The Elst Brewery is a place for us to focus and create great beers for your enjoyment! Our favorite part of creating beer is sharing it with others.

The team

Dan Leonard

Brewer

Long time home brewer and and recent graduate of the South College Professional Brewer's Program, Dan will be leading brewery operations.

Chris Hall

Beer Evangelist

Knoxville native and lover of all things beer! The other Chris has an insatiable curiosity for creating, studying, and tasting beer. With a background in computer science he will focus on the social, digital, marketing, and technology activities of the brewery.
